text: Ennum Sambhavami Yuge Yuge (Malayalam: എന്ന സംബവാമി യുഗെ യുഗെ) is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Alleppey Ashraf, starring Riyaz Pathanapuram and Srividya in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sri * Shalu Menon as Sona * Riyaz Pathanapuram as Kiran *Sreevidya as Professer/Kiran's mother * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kuttappy * Kalpana as Tapanokka/Kalayani * Bharath Gopi as Kiran's uncle * Bobby Kottarakkara as Ramettan * Indrans as Kiran's Friend * Jagadish as Sankarankutty * Mala Aravindan * Usha as Shantha ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Ennum Sambhavami Yuge Yuge
